title: Hey What is the college fee apart from the kea fee to be paid ??

comments.body:
Even I'm waiting to know what's the fee structure for cet folks. 
Back when I was studying, i remember paying 36-37k cet fee and 18k college fee 
2014-18 batch
As part of college fees, I remember them having optional fee where you can deny paying scholarship fund fees.Look for more details on this
Last year the college fees(apart from fees Paid to kea) was 21573 if u were intrested in availing scholarship cash award, if scholarship cash award wasnt required the fee was 11573
PES website does not mention any additional fees for CET admissions.Which is the correct source for the information?
Apart from kea fees(96k)what is the extra fees did they ask for the entire year?
